tit.cmt: 下線部分を変更しました。Sainooとoを追加しました。

sen.j: 斎尾廃寺跡（さいのおはいじあと）は、鳥取県東伯郡琴浦町にある奈良時代前期・白鳳時代の法隆寺式伽藍配置の寺院跡。
sen.e: Located in Kotoura-cho, Tohaku District, Tottori Prefecture, the remains of Saino abandoned temple is the site where a temple of "Hokki-ji-style temple layout" stood in the early Nara and Hakuho Period.

The remains of an abandoned temple, Sainoo-ji Temple located in Kotoura-cho, Tohaku-gun, Tottori Prefecture is a site where a temple's complex with the "Horyu-ji-style" layout once existed in the early Nara and Hakuho periods.

The remains of an abandoned temple, Sainoo-ji Temple located in Kotoura-cho, Tohaku-gun, Tottori Prefecture is a site where a temple's complex with the "Horyu-ji-style" layout once existed in the early Nara and Hakuho periods.

sen.j: 寺域が東西160メートル・南北250メートルの約4万平方メートルに及ぶ大規模なもの。
sen.e: It was a large-scale temple whose area covered about 40 thousand square meter with 160 meters from east to west and 250 meter from north to south.
It was a large-scale temple which had a field dimension of about 40 thousand ㎡ and measured 160 m from east to west and 250 m from north to south.
sen.cmt: whose area covered about→which had a field dimension ～としました。
sen.e: It was a large-scale temple which had a field dimension of about 40 thousand sq.m and measured 160 m from east to west and 250 m from north to south.

sen.j: 国の特別史跡に指定される。
sen.e: It was designated as a special historic site.
sen.cmt: 年代が抜けていると思いますので、「に」は省いてあります。
sen.e: It was designated as a special historic site in 1952.
sen.cmt: webの情報から、in 1952を加えました。
sen.e: It was designated as a special historic site in 1952.

sen.j: 出土遺物が優秀であることなどから、山陰地方で唯一の特別史跡となっている。
sen.e: It is the only special historic site in Sanin region because the excavated articles were in e good conditions.
It is designated as the only special historic site in the Sanin region because the excavated artifacts were in excellent conditions.
It is designated as the only special historic site in the Sanin region because the excavated artifacts were in excellent conditions.

sen.j: 遺跡からは瓦や土器類が多数出土している。
sen.e: Many tiles and earth wares were excavated from the remains.
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: Many tiles and earthenware were excavated from the remains.
Many tiles and earthenware were excavated from the remains.

sen.j: 「まなびタウンとうはく」に寺院の再現模型や出土品の一部が展示されている。
sen.e: A miniature model of the reconstructed temple and part of excavated articles are exhibited in "Manabi Town Tohaku."
sen.cmt: 一原文一訳文例外対処
sen.e: A scale model of the reconstructed temple and part of excavated articles are exhibited in the municipal lifelong study center "Manabi Town Tohaku."
sen.cmt: "Manabi Town Tohaku."の前に the municipal lifelong study center を加えました。
sen.e: A scale model of the reconstructed temple and part of excavated articles are exhibited in the municipal lifelong study center "Manabi Town Tohaku."
